title: UPDATE STUCK AT 0% HAVE TRIED EVERYTHING HELP!!
body: I'm stuck at 0% even though files are being scanned and after 5-10 minutes it stops and says "error 004 please restart your client". That's happening since yesterday. Hextech tool didn't do shit. Riot has still to answer my mail. Pls help someone.

replies.body: This error usually indicates a network issue reaching the patching servers, so it's failing to grab updates.  The HRT can do a lot like configure your firewall settings, but there may be other factors as well.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and rule out possibilities.  Let me know if you have any questions!
